name: swagger2aglio
description: Swagger 2.0 Documentation Generator Using Blueprints Aglio

scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.examples: node index.js -i petstore_expanded.yml -o examples/default.html && node index.js -i petstore_expanded.yml --theme-variables flatly --theme-template triple -o examples/flatly_triple.html
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Paul Sastrasinh
